name: Kindness
description:
Kindness is the first game created by Athena Sylvain.

 It's mostly narrative expression and exploration of themes I've found interesting.  I'll be updating it for the next couple of days, removing any bugs and adding a few more features.

Please, if you have opinions about it, leave me a comment telling me your feelings about it, and how you feel I can make it a better experience. 

Many thanks

Athena 

@recklessathena on Twitter.
